mapper.insert: insert into room_type(floorId, name, photo, price, liveNum, bedNum, roomNum, avilableNum, bookNum,livedNum, status, remark) values(#{floorId},#{name},#{photo},#{price},#{liveNum},#{bedNum},#{roomNum},#{avilableNum},#{bookNum},#{livedNum},#{status},#{remark});
mapper.update: update room_type set name=#{name}, photo=#{photo}, price=#{price}, liveNum=#{liveNum}, bedNum=#{bedNum}, roomNum=#{roomNum}, avilableNum=#{avilableNum}, bookNum=#{bookNum}, livedNum=#{livedNum}, status=#{status},remark =#{remark} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from room_type r JOIN (SELECT id from floor WHERE hight=#{hight}) f ON r.floorId=f.id WHERE name=#{name}
